code: import{useState,useContext}from"react";import{auth,db}from"../services/firebaseService";import{createUserWithEmailAndPassword}from"firebase/auth";import{doc,setDoc}from"firebase/firestore";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{UserContext}from"../context/UserContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Cadastro(){const[nome,setNome]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[senha,setSenha]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const{setUser}=useContext(UserContext);const handleCadastro=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const userCredential=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,senha);const user=userCredential.user;await setDoc(doc(db,"usuarios",user.uid),{nome,email});setUser(user);navigate("/");}catch(error){alert(error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Cadastro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleCadastro,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nome",value:nome,onChange:e=>setNome(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Senha",value:senha,onChange:e=>setSenha(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Cadastrar"})]})]});}
